description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update. If an existing instance is found and this flag is set there will be an error.

CompetencyObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

CompetencyObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

CompetencyObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Reference to an existing competency.  Only needs to be populated for inbound requests when updating a specific Competency.

Competency_Data.description: The Competency Name of the Competency.  When adding a new Competency, duplicate names are not allowed.
The Description of the Competency will be the same everywhere.  If Applies to All Levels is not marked True, Descriptions can be modified for each Management Level or Compensation Grade

Competency_CategoryObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Competency_CategoryObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Competency_CategoryObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Competency_Data.description: The Competency Category for the Competency.

Proficiency_RatingObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Proficiency_RatingObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Proficiency_RatingObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Competency_Rating_Behavior_Data.description: Describes the Proficiency Level in specific terms for the Competency.

Competency_Data.description: Defines a Proficiency Rating used in a Competency.

validation.validation: Proficiency Rating selected is not part of Proficiency Rating Scale.

Competency_Data.description: Boolean which indicates if the Competency is inactive.

On a Put this is the date the change to the Job Profile will take effect. Will default to today if not submitted.On a Get this is the As of Effective Date specified in the Response Filter or today's date if no request criteria is specified.During implementation, we recommend using a date of 01-01-1900 for the initial entry.

validation.validation: Can't edit a Competency with an effective date in the past.

Proficiency_Rating_ScaleObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Proficiency_Rating_ScaleObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Proficiency_Rating_ScaleObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Competency_Data.description: Boolean to specify if competency behaviors apply to all levels.
Check this box if you would like to use this Competency as the horizontal axis when setting up nBox reports for the Talent Matrix.

description: This element contains the data elements for a Competency.

validation.validation: A competency with the name '[competency name]' already exists in the system, and duplicates are not allowed.
Number of Proficiency Ratings do not match with number of competency levels in a Proficiency Rating Scale.
